about_the_game:
Embark on an electrifying extension to the beloved game with "Magic City Detective: The Carnival Begins DLC". New Orleans is alive with the vibrant colors and raucous celebrations of Mardi Gras, but beneath the festive surface lurk mysteries only you can solve. Join forces with Elizabeth, navigate the blurred lines between the world of Men and Others, and confront challenges that could alter the very fabric of reality. With four additional locations brimming with secrets, hidden objects, and intricate puzzles, your detective skills will be put to the ultimate test. Are you ready to delve into the unknown?

Enjoy refined gameplay elements designed to challenge both new players and seasoned detectives. From innovative hidden object scenes to unique puzzles that test your logic and intuition!

🏰 DISCOVER THE LEGEND OF THE DAGGER OF WORLDS!
Uncover a tale of forbidden love and mystical intrigue. Search for a magical book in the library to learn the history of a weapon that could change destinies.

🏰 LEARN MORE ABOUT THE SPIRIT OF MARDI GRAS!
Dive into the heart of New Orleans during the exuberant Mardi Gras celebrations! Enter the spirit's lair and overcome a series of mini-games to understand the true essence of this jubilant time.

🏰 GATHER INFORMATION ABOUT THE SPIRIT CHAIN!
Investigate Elizabeth's library for crucial knowledge. Learn to concoct sleeping potions for plants and find a way to access a safeguarded tome of great importance.

🏰 LOOK INTO ESMERO CONTRACTS!
Dive into a web of intrigue surrounding Esmero's collection of spirit contracts. Retrieve the missing documents and expose the secrets they hold.

With new locations, mysteries, and challenges, "Magic City Detective: The Carnival Begins" DLC offers an unparalleled adventure that will test your abilities and determination!
